# int

Integral numbers

| Operation          | Description
|--------------------|---------------
| [`div-rem, dr`](#div-rem) | Division with remainder


## div-rem

Divides *p0* by *p1* and returns the quotient *q* and remainder *r*.

Alias: `dr`

```
( p0:Decimal p1:Decimal -- r:Decimal q:Decimal )
```

Example:

<!-- test: div-rem -->

| Input              | Stack
|--------------------|---------------
| `1234 100 div-rem` | `34 \| 12`
